headline: GTA Online
subtitle: The Finer Things in Life
content: You’ve added custom tints, mags and sights to everything in your gun locker – but somehow, that still hasn’t scratched the itch. If you’re in need of an even deeper hit, check out the new mod sets that have just hit town. Whether it’s the Pump Shotgun, Special Carbine, Marksman Rifle, Heavy Revolver, Bullpup Rifle or SNS Pistol – take it to the Weapon Workshop in your Mobile Operations Center or Avenger for an Mk II upgrade that’ll give it a whole new lease of life.
